content: Due to increased demand for <style=ItemHighlight>{cropName1}</style> yesterday, today's price is up <style=ItemHighlight>{num1}</style>. Meanwhile, with demand for <style=ItemHighlight>{cropName2}</style> down, its price has fallen by <style=ItemHighlight>{num2}</style> today!

Due to increased demand for <style=ItemHighlight>{cropName1}</style> yesterday, today's price is up <style=ItemHighlight>{num1}</style>. Meanwhile, with demand for <style=ItemHighlight>{cropName2}</style> down, its price has fallen by <style=ItemHighlight>{num2}</style> today!
No demand changes yesterday. All produce will be bought at the base price today!
As of {time} today, <style=ItemHighlight>{cropName}</style> remains the least planted crop. With harvest just {num} days away, its price may well go up!
As of {time} today, planting shares of all crops remain even, suggesting limited price fluctuation once they mature!
